title: GNAR ADC????

replies.body: Even during the game you mentioned you didn't build him like an adc. Just a bruiser you brought bot lane. Not that you need an adc to win in league but he doesn't work very well as a true adc.
I guess that could be true. Thank you! :)

Try a few custom games with him adc, grab so friends and try him out. That way it shouldn't bother anyone if you were to play in a normals or ranked. If it works, awesome, if it doesn't, well, at least he can go top.
I may do that! And yes he is awesome top too. Thanks!

ehhhh, i mean its not bad until you go mega. It has decent synergy with some supports, but some adc's like vayne lategame will just kite you and destroy you. This is the ranged cheese build for top, not really an adc build imo. Probably like, Trinity -> IE -> PD -> BT -> GA or a defense item, or maybe just another zeal item for 100% crit.
Mega Gnar is now Mega Useless.
